downloadTitle: Forefront Unified Access Gateway (UAG) Content Series - Infrastructure Planning Guide
detailsSection: The Forefront UAG Infrastructure Planning guide is designed to help you understand the design requirements for Forefront UAG deployment, identify your Forefront UAG deployment goals, and understand what changes are required in your current infrastructure design in order to meet your deployment goals. An online version of this guide is available in the TechNet library (http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd857252.aspx).
installInstructionSection:
• To start the download, click the Download button, and then do one of the following:
    • To start the download immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer for viewing at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the download, click Cancel.
